DataElement.preferredName: Rectum Visual For Sufficient Collection Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response to a question that asks if there was sufficient visualization of the rectum for collection of biopsy sepcimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The terminal portion of the gastrointestinal tract, extending from the rectosigmoid junction to the anal canal._Visual; relating to or using sight; able to be seen._The reason of something._Meeting a quantitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation. New NCI Definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.
